q14.question: A trader received a commission of 5% on goods sold at GH₵ 25,000.00. Find the commission. GH₵ 1,250.00 GH₵ 1,200.00 GH₵ 1,100.00 GH₵ 1,000.00

q16.question: It costs a carpenter GH₵ 25.00 to make a chair. How much should it be sold to make a profit of 40%? GH₵ 15.00 GH₵ 35.00 GH₵ 40.00 GH₵ 50.00

q22.question: A box contains 10 green and 8 white balls of the same size. If a ball is selected at random from the box, what is the probability that it is green?

q24.question: A trader sold half of a piece of cloth and used two-fifths of the remaining to sew a dress. What fraction of the cloth was left?
